desc.welcome-desc: You can now write cross-platform web applications. See changes in real time and build to multiple platforms with one command. If you're not already familiar with it, you can get help from the documentation page below, or run some pre-written example code.
desc.second-desc: You have moved to the second screen! There is nothing here!

app.title: Image Rename Tool
app.description: Automatically convert Chinese filenames to English with multiple naming conventions and auto-categorization

empty.title: Select Image Folder to Start
empty.description: Please select a folder containing images, the tool will automatically scan and generate rename preview
